thread.title: Prince Harry's girlfriend spotted wearing 'promise ring' complete with the letter H
thread.title_full: Prince Harry's girlfriend spotted wearing 'promise ring' complete with the letter H

author: Nicola Bartlett
title: Prince Harry's girlfriend spotted wearing 'promise ring' complete with the letter H
text:
Showbiz Prince Harry's girlfriend spotted wearing 'promise ring' complete with the letter H Promise rings are normally worn on the wedding finger but on the right hand and are a sign of two people committing to each other Share Meghan Markel spotted with a promise ring (Photo: LDN PIX)   
Actress Meghan Markle â€™s relationship with Prince Harry seems to be blooming as she wears a gold ring that appears to have the letter H on it. 
Promise rings are normally worn on the wedding finger but on the right hand and are a sign of two people committing to each other. 
Some people even wear their engagement ring on the other hand prior to being formally engaged. 
There is speculation that Prince Harry and Meghan are engaged and will make a formal announcement this year. 
Meghan and Harry moved in.... was carrying two bunches of flowers for the cottage she is now living in with Harry. Prince Harry is smitten with his girlfriend (Photo: PA) Meghan Markel spotted with a promise ring beside a ring with the initial H (Photo: LDN PIX) 
Last week the couple were spotted holding hands in public for the first time. 
The pair were first linked in.... 
Promise rings became popular in the United States but have been increasingly crossing the Atlantic spurred on by celebrity exposure. 
Promise rings have become a mainstream trend in the past ten years thanks to celebrity wearers including the Jonas brothers and Miley Cyrus. (Photo: LDN PIX) 
Traditionally engagements last between and 12 and 18 months. 
There has been speculation that the couple may make their first official outing as a couple when Pippa Middleton ties the knot with her fiance James Matthews on May 20. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
